definition: prop/support (for weight)/rest (e.g. arm rest)/thanks to/to hold in one's hand/to support in one's palm/to give/to base/to commit/to set/torr (unit of pressure)
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"

sentences.english: Toledo also reasserted that the Peru government will firmly follow the one-China policy.
sentences.chinese: 托萊多還重申，祕魯政府堅定地奉行一箇中國政策。

sentences.english: Prior to the talks, Hu held a welcoming ceremony for Toledo's visit.
sentences.chinese: 會談前，胡錦濤爲托萊多訪華舉行了歡迎儀式。

sentences.english: Zeng Qinghong and Toledo attended the signing ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 曾慶紅和托萊多出席了簽字儀式。

sentences.english: Two Chinese developers have bought property in Toledo.
sentences.chinese: 兩位中國開發者已在托萊多買下地產。
